医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能系统可以加速腹腔镜手术培训得益于赫瑞瓦特大学国家机器人中心的研究人员与邓迪医疗模拟研究所合作开发的人工智能系统，学习腹腔镜（或锁孔）手术的实习外科医生将很快能够更快地完成培训邓迪大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-empowered-system-may-accelerate-laparooscopy-surgery-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-empowered-system-may-accelerate-laparooscopy-surgery-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfbdd8bf-d0ad-4d35-a066-4b68d13ffbc8 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:16:00 -0500 AI-empowered system may accelerate laparoscopic surgery training
新的运动试验旨在改善类风湿关节炎患者的生活质量类风湿性关节炎是一种炎症性疾病，可导致关节剧烈疼痛和肿胀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-exercise-trial-aims-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-exercise-trial-aims-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a214c9d4-6917-47c1-9691-06b0029f4371 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:10:00 -0500 New exercise trial aims to improve quality of life for people with rheumatoid arthritis
研究探讨低热量甜味剂对肠道健康的隐藏影响该研究仔细研究了低热量和无热量甜味剂对肠道微生物群的影响，表明其与葡萄糖耐量和胰岛素抵抗之间存在潜在联系，不同研究的结果不同，表明需要进行更全面的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Study-probes-the-hidden-impact-of-low-cal-sweeteners-on-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Study-probes-the-hidden-impact-of-low-cal-sweeteners-on-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b27367e-2db9-48b1-83f0-e492183c8a47 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:54:00 -0500 Study probes the hidden impact of low-cal sweeteners on gut health
工业界和学术界联合支持方酸单酰胺的合成作为药物发现的基础材料Asynt 与金斯顿大学和 Key Organics 合作开发了一个易于使用的新型合成化合物库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Industry-academia-combine-to-support-synthesis-of-squaric-acid-monoamides-as-building-blocks-for-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Industry-academia-combine-to-support-synthesis-of-squaric-acid-monoamides-as-building-blocks-for-drug-discovery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b6e2eb0-231e-4c0c-b059-2f004a3ada0f Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:51:00 -0500 Industry & academia combine to support synthesis of squaric acid monoamides as building blocks for drug discovery
戒除烟瘾：戒烟五年后口腔微生物群恢复正常研究发现，吸烟有利于厌氧菌，从而重塑口腔微生物群，可能会导致健康风险，但如果戒烟五年以上，这种影响可能会逆转，恢复与不吸烟者相似的微生物群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Kicking-the-habit-Oral-microbiota-bounces-back- Five-years-after-quitting-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Kicking-the-habit-Oral-microbiota-bounces-back- Five-years-after-quitting-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=158667da-5cff-4605-87e1-856a6dbc267a Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:34:00 -0500 Kicking the habit: Oral microbiota bounces back five years after quitting smoking
荷兰研究显示，SSRIs有望缓解新冠疫情后的困境荷兰研究发现，SSRIs 可以显着缓解新冠肺炎后综合症症状，提供有希望的治疗途径，并揭示发挥作用的神经生物学机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/SSRIs-show-promise-in-easing-post-COVID-struggles-Dutch-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/SSRIs-show-promise-in-easing-post-COVID-struggles-Dutch-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=170019de-2c0d-419f-a97f-b70d0304606a Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:22:00 -0500 SSRIs show promise in easing post-COVID struggles, Dutch study reveals
各州概况：长期新冠疫情的影响各不相同，心理健康成为焦点研究显示，14% 的美国人面临长期新冠病毒感染，不同州和种族之间存在差异，这与身心健康状况的显着下降有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/State-by-state-snapshot-Long-COVIDs-grip-varies-with-mental-health-in-the-crosshairs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/State-by-state-snapshot-Long-COVIDs-grip-varies-with-mental-health-in-the-crosshairs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8d79293-aa53-46d2-900c-8f3d8192ea31 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:08:00 -0500 State-by-state snapshot: Long-COVID's grip varies, with mental health in the crosshairs
营养生物标志物研究表明，每天吃鳄梨可以预防糖尿病《营养杂志》上的新研究将食用鳄梨与降低糖尿病风险联系起来，揭示了特定的代谢组生物标志物，表明有可能降低空腹血糖和胰岛素水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Avocado-a-day-may-keep-diabetes-at-bay-suggests-nutritional-biomarker-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Avocado-a-day-may-keep-diabetes-at-bay-suggests-nutritional-biomarker-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=638c3a9f-e9f8-4875-a4d5-7c73837d82db Sun, 05 Nov 2023 22:44:00 -0500 Avocado a day may keep diabetes at bay, suggests nutritional biomarker study
禽流感导致秘鲁 5% 的海狮死亡，引发保护警报超过 5,000 只秘鲁海狮（约占秘鲁人口的 5%）死于与甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病毒相关的大规模死亡事件，这表明迫切需要开展研究和保护工作，以防止数量进一步减少。该病毒在这些群体繁殖的哺乳动物中迅速传播，凸显了跨物种传播的潜在风险，以及加强监测以避免新的流行病的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Avian-flu-decimates-525-of-Perus-sea-lions-sparking-conservation-alarm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Avian-flu-decimates-525-of-Perus-sea-lions-sparking-conservation-alarm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86e313f5-4539-41c3-9187-bff1e3381fff Sun, 05 Nov 2023 22:37:00 -0500 Avian flu decimates 5% of Peru's sea lions, sparking conservation alarm
合成黑色素纳米粒子促进皮肤伤口愈合和组织修复在《npj 再生医学》最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员讨论了黑色素纳米颗粒支持小鼠伤口恢复的能力。在仿生模型和人类皮肤外植体上探索并证实了组织学和基因水平的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Synthetic-melanin-nanoarticles-boost-wound-healing-and-tissue-repair-in-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Synthetic-melanin-nanoarticles-boost-wound-healing-and-tissue-repair-in-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f900e15-b007-4c74-baec-a5fbaeb03bf4 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 22:29:00 -0500 Synthetic melanin nanoparticles boost wound healing and tissue repair in skin
